clinical_study.brief_title: Anlotinib in Treatment of Recurrent Small Cell Lung Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: One-arm, Phase II, Single-center Clinical Study of Anlotinib in the Treatment of Recurrent Small Cell Lung Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: Exploring the efficacy and safety of Anlotinib in patients with relapsed small cell lung cancer

detailed_description.textblock: This is an one-arm, phase II, single-center clinical study of Anlotinib in the treatment of recurrent small cell lung cancer, the objection is to exploring the efficacy and safety of Anlotinib in patients with relapsed small cell lung cancer.It is going to enroll 43 patients.
